verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050> Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH376> that fears<WH3372> the LORD,<WH3068> that delights<WH2654> greatly<WH3966> in his commandments.<WH4687>
His seed<WH2233> shall be mighty<WH1368> on earth:<WH776> the generation<WH1755> of the upright<WH3477> shall be blessed.<WH1288>
Wealth<WH1952> and riches<WH6239> shall be in his house:<WH1004> and his righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> for ever.<WH5703>
To the upright<WH3477> there rises<WH2224> light<WH216> in the darkness:<WH2822> he is gracious,<WH2587> and full of compassion,<WH7349> and righteous.<WH6662>
A good<WH2896> man<WH376> shows favor,<WH2603> and lends:<WH3867> he will guide<WH3557> his affairs<WH1697> with discretion.<WH4941>
Surely<WH3588> he shall not be moved<WH4131> for ever:<WH5769> the righteous<WH6662> shall be in everlasting<WH5769> remembrance.<WH2143>
He shall not be afraid<WH3372> of evil<WH7451> tidings:<WH8052> his heart<WH3820> is fixed,<WH3559> trusting<WH982> in the LORD.<WH3068>
His heart<WH3820> is established,<WH5564> he shall not be afraid,<WH3372> until<WH5704> he see<WH7200> his desire on his enemies.<WH6862>
He has dispersed,<WH6340> he has given<WH5414> to the poor;<WH34> his righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> for ever;<WH5703> his horn<WH7161> shall be exalted<WH7311> with honor.<WH3519>
The wicked<WH7563> shall see<WH7200> it, and be grieved;<WH3707> he shall gnash<WH2786> with his teeth,<WH8127> and melt<WH4549> away: the desire<WH8378> of the wicked<WH7563> shall perish.<WH6>
